Psychology 4780 David J. Stanley 2020-06-06 Preface Hi there, this is my great book. Why read this book It is very important… Structure of the book Chapters 1 introduces a new topic, and … Software information and conventions I used the knitr package (Xie 2015) and the bookdown package (Xie 2020) to compile my book.
